Grammy award winner Tori Kelly chats with USA TODAY's Ralphie Aversa about her first holiday album, "A Tori Kelly Christmas."
USA TODAY
Tis the season for Christmas music  and lots of it.

articles.title: A guide to this year’s holiday movies, from Dolly Parton’s musical to Kristen Stewart’s queer rom-com - The Washington Post
articles.description: Not even an airborne virus can stop Hallmark, Lifetime and Netflix from churning out movies this holiday season.
articles.content: Luckily, the annual barrage of ugly sweaters and eggnog-fueled drama has already commenced, with some of the earliest contenders hitting streaming platforms in late October Halloween be damned. Big C… [+6992 chars]

articles.author: Robert Daniels
articles.title: ‘Black Beauty’ Review: A Melodrama in Need of Rougher Edges - The New York Times
articles.description: Set in the present day, this adaptation of the classic children’s novel forgets why the story of a horse surviving the maliciousness of humans has endured for so long.
articles.content: Angry at the world, Jo softens after meeting Beauty, a kindred spirit without a family, too. On the ranchs sun-kissed pastures, the girl and horse heal each other, until a fire destroys the stables a… [+1145 chars]
